attributes.action: Remove Joe Anderson and Steven Rotherham as Mayor and Metro Myor of Liverpool
attributes.additional_details: We wish parliament to help the people of Liverpool the right to choose more suitable candidates as we have absolutely no confidence or trust in the Mayors of Liverpool anymore.
attributes.background: We would like to have Joe Anderson and Steve Rotherham both removed as mayors to our city and have both positions filled by people more suited and willing to listen and work with the people of the city

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments.  That includes petitions calling for people to lose their job.
